titleStmt.title: E. E. Garrett to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2915

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1859-1862

body.p:
Mt Sterling, Ky
Decr 27th 1860
To his Exelency:
B. Magoffin
Dear Sir,

Having learned that you would probably call the Legislature of Ky together, I thought it my duty to inform you that Col. James Mckee Member of the senate from this district, departed this life a few days since

Your Respectfully
E. E. Garrett, clk m, c, c,

33d Senatorial District
Jas McKee
Decd
Proclamation for sussesser issd Decr 27. 1860
